title: Requirements Analysis and Utilization of Mobile-Based Remote RF Laboratory Development

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Addresses the need to build remote lab platforms accessible solely via smartphones in environments without PC availability

learning_goals: Learners can explain step-by-step procedures for remote control of RF laboratory equipment.
Learners can perform signal generation/measurement experiments via a smartphone-based interface with 80% accuracy.
Learners can analyze remote experimental data to derive basic RF parameters (frequency, amplitude, etc.).

resources: RF Experimental Equipment Control Software API
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
